import { Box, Center, Button, Grid, Image, Text, GridItem} from "@chakra-ui/react" import { Spin as Hamburger } from 'hamburger-react' import {useState, useEffect} from "react" import { slide as Menu } from 'react-burger-menu' function NavBar() { const [isOpen, setOpen] = useState(false) return( DataX {isOpen ? ( <>
ROCKETS
LAUNCHES
LAUNCHPADS
 ) : null} ) } export default NavBar;
